channel.title: Milestone 2 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Spring 2023 offering of that course. Prior semester offerings can be found here. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. For this milestone, you will be creating classes to represent the offerings of The Flying Saucer - a fast-food breakfast franchise.
